LogService.description: The LogService schema contains properties for monitoring and configuring a log service.  When the Id property contains `DeviceLog`, the log contains device-resident log entries that follow the physical device when moved from system-to-system, and not a replication or subset of a system event log.
LogService.longDescription: This resource shall represent a log service for a Redfish implementation.  When the Id property contains `DeviceLog`, the log shall contain log entries that migrate with the device.

title: #LogService.LogService
